module.name: pygame2.sdlext.font
module.short: Enhanced font rendering for SDL-based surfaces
module.desc: Enhanced and specialised font rendering classes and functions for SDL-based surfaces.

class.name: BitmapFont
class.desc:
Creates a BitmapFont suitable for bitmap to character mappings.
The BitmapFont class uses an image surface to find and render font character glyphs for text. It requires a * mapping* table, which denotes the characters available on the image.
The *mapping* table is a list of strings, where each string reflects a 'line' of characters on the image. Each character within each line has the same size as specified by the size argument.
A typical mapping table might look like ::
[ '0123456789', 'ABCDEFGHIJ', 'KLMNOPQRST', 'UVWXYZ ', 'abcdefghij', 'klmnopqrst', 'uvwxyz ', ',;.:!?+-()' ]

method.name: can_render
method.desc: Checks, whether all characters in the passed text can be rendered.

method.name: contains
method.desc: Checks, whether a certain character exists in the font.

method.name: render_on
method.desc:
Renders a text on the passed surface, starting at offset.
Renders a *text* on the existing *surface* . The top-left start position of the *text* will be the passed *offset* and a :class:`pygame2.Rect` with the changed area will be returned.

method.name: render
method.desc: Renders the passed *text* on a new :class:`pygame2.sdl.video.Surface` and returns it.
